info.name: ░▒▌Firefox Status Text - Anywhere▐▒░
info.description: For Fx25+: Keep the addon-bar visible. For versions prior: Add the "Activity Indicator" to the left of a "Flexible Space", place these two items anywhere, on any toolbar. The Flexible Space will be coloured green if you've customised correctly. Your status text will appear there (Firefox 4+ only). Uses only CSS; no bloat.
info.additionalInfo: For versions prior Fx25, ensure: • ¡important! Don't put anything between the "Activity Indicator" (on left) and "Flexible Space" (on right) • If you don't like the throbber, remove the code ":not([busy="true"])" • If you want to center the text, replace "transparent 2px" (on the last line) with "transparent 50%". • Changing minimum width? Replace "15em" (last line) with your desired value.
